questionNumInput¶

Question the number of questions and the total number of pages in one test.

Direction of Progress: start.py –> questionNumInput.py –> problemSetting.py

  • Metadata such as the number of questions in the test, the total number of pages in a set of test papers, and whether or not OCR was used for subjective grading

  • Subsequently, the unmarked test paper is entered and processed, then transferred to the ‘problemSetting’ section

class questionNumInput.questionNumInput.Ui_QuestionNumInput¶

First Page of the Program.

whether the mouse is pressed or not

problemCoordinateList = []¶

Temporary variable for storing dragged problem marking areas

problemIsAnswerList = []¶

A temporary variable, True or False, that stores the correct answers for each dragged marking area.
